mapbaltimore 0.1.0

    • External, cached, and remote data sources

Reference

Boundary data

baltimore_city

Generalized political boundary for Baltimore City

baltimore_city_detailed

Detailed physical boundary for Baltimore City

baltimore_msa_counties

County boundaries for the Baltimore–Columbia–Towson MSA

neighborhoods

Neighborhood boundaries for Baltimore City

council_districts

Baltimore City Council Districts

legislative_districts

Maryland Legislative Districts for Baltimore City

congressional_districts

U.S. Congressional Districts for Baltimore City

planning_districts

Baltimore City Planning Districts

csas

Baltimore City Community Statistical Areas

police_districts

Baltimore City Police Districts

wards_1797_1918

Historic Ward Boundaries, 1797-1918 for Baltimore City

U.S. Census area data

baltimore_blocks

U.S. Census Blocks (2010 Decennial) in Baltimore City

baltimore_block_groups

U.S. Census Block Groups in Baltimore City

baltimore_tracts

U.S. Census Tracts in Baltimore City

Other data on physical features or public services

baltimore_water

Baltimore Water

parks

Baltimore City Parks

streets

Baltimore City Street Center lines

baltimore_mihp

Maryland Inventory of Historic Properties in Baltimore City

bcps_programs

Baltimore City Public School Programs

bcps_zones

Baltimore City Public Schools School Zones or School Attendance Zones

mta_bus_lines

Maryland Transit Administration Summer 2020 Bus Routes

adopted_plans

Adopted city plans, accepted community-initiated plans, and LINCS corridors

request_types

311 Service Request Types for Baltimore City

zoning

Baltimore City Zoning Code

explore_baltimore

Stories from Explore Baltimore Heritage

hmt_2017

Housing Market Typology 2017

Get local or cached data for mapping and analysis

get_area()

Get area of selected administrative type

check_area()

Validate area provided to mapping or charting function.

get_area_data()

Get local or cached data for an area

get_buffered_area()

Get buffered area

get_adjusted_bbox()

Get bounding box buffered and adjusted to aspect ratio

get_asp_adjusted_bbox()

Get bounding box adjusted to aspect ratio

get_nearby_areas()

Get nearby areas

get_area_census_geography()

Get U.S. Census geography overlapping with an area.

get_area_streets()

Get selected area streets

get_area_property()

Get real property data for an area

get_area_zoning()

Get zoning data a local area

cache_mapbaltimore_data()

Cache data for mapbaltimore package

cache_edge_of_pavement()

Cache edge of pavement data for Baltimore City

cache_msa_streets()

Cache street centerline data for counties in the Baltimore MSA

cache_real_property()

Cache real property data for Baltimore City

Map local data using ggplot2

map_area_in_city()

Map area in the context of city boundaries

map_area_highlighted()

Maps a highlighted area within the context of multiple areas

map_area_in_areas()

Map area within selected overlapping areas

map_area_with_snapbox()

Map area using the snapbox package

map_area_bcps_programs()

Map BCPS programs and attendance zones for a local area

map_decade_built()

Map real property data to show decade built

map_area_property()

Map real property data for an area

map_area_zoning()

Map zoning for a local area

map_area_mta_services()

Map MTA services

map_area_parks()

Map area parks and open spaces

layer_area_mask()

Get a mask for an area

layer_area_streets()

Add a layer to a gpplot2 map with area streets, names, or both

Get remote data

get_area_esri_data()

Get data from an ArcGIS FeatureServer or MapServer

get_osm_feature()

Get Open Street Map features for area

maryland_open_data_api_key()

Install a Maryland Open Data Portal API Key in Your .Renviron File for Repeated Use

get_maryland_open_resource()

Get dataset from Maryland Open Data portal with optional SoQL parameters

get_area_crashes()

Get vehicle crashes for area in Baltimore from Maryland Open Data portal

Modify a map theme or limits

set_map_theme()

Set default map theme

set_map_limits()

Set map limits to area
